item_description: it's a gun, what else do you want? found from a few jobs

item_quotes.quote: {user} fires their Handgun at {target} and deals {damage} damage!
{user} pulls out their Handgun and shoots at {target}, causing {damage} damage!
With a steady hand, {user} aims their Handgun at {target} and inflicts {damage} damage!
Bang! {user} uses their Handgun to strike {target}, dealing {damage} damage!
{user} takes aim with their Handgun and hits {target} for {damage} damage!
A quick shot from {user}'s Handgun hits {target}, causing {damage} damage!
{user} shoots their Handgun at {target} and scores {damage} damage!
The sound of gunfire echoes as {user} fires their Handgun at {target}, dealing {damage} damage!
A well-placed shot from {user}'s Handgun strikes {target}, causing {damage} damage!
{user} unloads their Handgun on {target}, dealing {damage} damage in the process!
